name: [東方二次] Senran Meisuishu Tactics / 戦乱命萃酒タクティクス
description: One day, a strange cup appeared in Gensokyo. A big fight will occur in search of it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Core2 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
